mapper.insert: INSERT INTO "user" ( USER_NO, USER_ID, USER_PW, USER_NAME, USER_BIRTH, USER_GENDER, USER_EMAIL, USER_PHONE, USER_ADDRESS, USER_JOINDATE, ACCOUNT_STATUS_NO, USER_PROFILE_URL ) VALUES ( #{user_no}, #{user_id}, #{user_pw}, #{user_name}, #{user_birth}, #{user_birth}, #{user_gender}, #{user_email}, #{user_phone}, #{user_address}, #{user_joindate}, #{account_status_no}, #{user_profile_url} )
